markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Necromantic Physiology](/Feats.aspx?ID=1342) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your unusual physiology has developed in a way that makes it difficult for parasites and other infestations to prey upon you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against [diseases](/Traits.aspx?ID=46).
name: Necromantic Physiology
